name: SignalK
0:
”Alexa, launch Signal K”
”Alexa, ask Signal K What is the fuel level”
”Alexa, ask Signal K What is the battery charge”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: signal k.
des:
When you connect your Signal K Node server to the Signal K cloud, you can use Alexa get information like wind speed, battery charge, tank levels, etc.

You can set your units preferences by asking Signal K to "Use meters for depth", "User knots for wind speed", or "Use celsius for temperature"

Some of the items you can ask for:
* cabin temperature
* water temperature
* outside temperature
* depth below keel
* depth below surface
* speed over ground
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
